SELECT A.DAY_DATE dayDate, DATE_FORMAT(A.DAY_DATE,'%Y.%c.%e') dayDateStr, A.RETAINED_PROFITS retainedProfits, A.GROSS_PROFIT grossProfit, A.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, A.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, A.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, A.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, A.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount, A.TOTAL_COST totalCost FROM DAY_SALES A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER_SHOP S WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_ID = A.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE = '1' AND S.SHOP_ID = #{shopId})
AND A.SHOP_ID IS NULL
AND A.DAY_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startData},'%Y-%m-%d') AND A.DAY_DATE <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT D.* from DAY_SALES D WHERE D.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.SHOP_ID IS NULL

SELECT A.DAY_DATE dayDate, DATE_FORMAT(A.DAY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') dayDateStr, SUM(A.TOTAL_ORDER) totalOrder, SUM(A.SUCCEED_ORDER) succeedOrder, SUM(A.FAILED_ORDER) failedOrder, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) saleAmount, SUM(A.COST_AMOUNT) costAmount, SUM(A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT) virtualAmount FROM DAY_SALES A ,USER_SHOP S WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_ID = A.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' GROUP BY A.DAY_DATE order by a.DAY_DATE desc

select M.SHOP_ID shopId, M.SHOP_NAME shopName, M.MONTH_DATE monthDateStr, M.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, M.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, M.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, M.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, M.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, IFNULL(PI.advert_Amount,0) advertAmount, IFNULL(PI.service_Amount,0) serviceAmount, M.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount FROM (SELECT A.SHOP_ID , S.SHOP_NAME , A.MONTH_DATE , SUM(A.TOTAL_ORDER) TOTAL_ORDER, SUM(A.SUCCEED_ORDER) SUCCEED_ORDER, SUM(A.FAILED_ORDER) FAILED_ORDER, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) SALE_AMOUNT, SUM(A.COST_AMOUNT) COST_AMOUNT, SUM(A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT) VIRTUAL_AMOUNT FROM(SELECT C.SHOP_ID, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(C.DAY_DATE,'%Y-%m'),'-01') MONTH_DATE, C.TOTAL_ORDER, C.SUCCEED_ORDER, C.FAILED_ORDER, C.SALE_AMOUNT, C.COST_AMOUNT, C.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT FROM DAY_SALES C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} ) A,USER_SHOP S WHERE S.SHOP_ID = A.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' GROUP BY A.MONTH_DATE,A.SHOP_ID ) M LEFT JOIN (SELECT PP.SHOP_ID, PP.MONTH_DATE, SUM(IF(PP.PAY_TYPE='1', PP.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) ADVERT_AMOUNT, SUM(IF(PP.PAY_TYPE='2', PP.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) SERVICE_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT P.SHOP_ID, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(P.PAY_DATE,'%Y-%m'),'-01') MONTH_DATE, P.PAY_TYPE, P.PAY_AMOUNT FROM pay_info P WHERE P.USER_ID = #{userId} ) pp GROUP BY PP.MONTH_DATE,PP.SHOP_ID) PI ON PI.SHOP_ID = M.SHOP_ID AND PI.MONTH_DATE = M.MONTH_DATE

SELECT D.DS_ID dsId, DATE_FORMAT(D.DAY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') dayDateStr, D.SHOP_ID shopId, S.SHOP_NAME shopName, D.RETAINED_PROFITS retainedProfits, D.RETAINED_PROFITS_RATE retainedProfitsRate, D.GROSS_PROFIT grossProfit, D.GROSS_PROFIT_RATE grossProfitRate, D.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, D.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, D.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, D.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, D.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, D.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount, D.TOTAL_COST totalCost FROM DAY_SALES D LEFT JOIN USER_SHOP S ON S.USER_ID = #{obj.userId} AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' AND S.SHOP_ID = D.SHOP_ID WHERE D.USER_ID = #{obj.userId}
AND D.SHOP_ID IS NULL
AND D.SHOP_ID IS NOT NULL
AND D.SHOP_ID = #{obj.shopId}
AND D.DAY_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE(#{obj.startDateStr},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND D.DAY_DATE <= STR_TO_DATE(#{obj.endDateStr},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY D.DAY_DATE DESC
